name: Hizoku Recyclery 56cm Purple Kilo TT 25c tires 19lb
description:
Whether you are road riding, training or bombing through the city, you’ll know you have the right bike for the job. The geometry is designed to give you an aggressive pursuit style feel but maintain a comfortable angle for long distance rides of 50+miles The frame is made from steel and gives a stiff, responsive ride with comfort.
Price : $500 + Shipping
Frame: A Used but in great shape Cromoly 520 Reynolds Steel 56cm Kilo TT great for height of 5'11 to 6'1

Wheel Set: H+Plus tb14 Rims with Formula Hubs Wrapped with 25c Lithion 2 tires.

Crank: Sram S300 48t 165mm, 24m Spindle for superior stiffness 

Drivetrain: 16t White Industries Freewheel/17t fixed gear cog

Bottom Bracket: External GXP Sram 

Handlebars: Fixation Bullhorns

Pedals: Wellgo magnesium 

Bicycle Weight: 19lbs

This Hizoku Recyclery Kilo TT bicycle build was designed and built to be a fast, durable and an agile bicycle. It balances comfort and speed. Its a great bike to train on for athletes of all kinds to use as a strength training device. Its a great fast daily commuter.


*Note Due to this Bicycle build being a single speed it forces the rider to completely change the way they ride  which differs greatly with the common multigeared bike approach of bike riding. When a rider encounters a hill with a multigeared bike the rider will start to down shift into a more "comfortable" gear to get up the hill where as the single speed rider must be aggressive and attack the hill to maintain their momentum up the hill and then turn to pedal grinding at the top of the hill which gives the rider a great core body workout. Single speed riders mindset is about efficiency and well timed bike riding position changes to maximize your power output.

All of our bike builds come ready to ride out of the box minus the installation of the handle bars, pedals , seat and front wheel. Takes no more than 20 minutes to adjust these components to your desired specifications for riding. The bike drive chain has been professionally installed to ensure true chain straightness and tension with the crank and freewheel/fixed gear cog, for an optimal riding experience. Each of our bike builds come with a free Hizoku Bicycle Co T-shirt in your selected size.

Single speed riders mindset is about efficiency and well timed bike riding position changes to maximize your power output.

name: Silverback Street Path 23lb Racer 35c tires
description: Sold Out! New stock coming soon. Whether you are trail riding or bombing through the city, you’ll know you have the right bike for the job. The frame is steel which gives a stiff, responsive ride with great comfort. If you are looking for a lightweight, fast and comfortable commuter this is the bike for you. Price : $1000 + Shipping Frame:Cromoly 520 Reynolds Steel Motobecane Jury 53cm rides like 55cm with 35c tires Wheel Set: H+Plus Archetype Rims with Formula Hubs Wrapped with 35c Vittoria Randonneur Crank: Sram S300 48t 165mm, 24m Spindle for superior stiffness Drivetrain: 16t White Industries Freewheel/17t fixed gear cog Bottom Bracket: External GXP Sram Handlebars: State Co Mini BMX steel Bars with bar ends for climbing Pedals: Superstar ULTRA Magnesium CNC Pedals Lightweight Bicycle Weight: 23lbs The Hizoku Silverback Path Racer was designed and built to be a very comfortable ride but still be able to dart through traffic and some dirt trails all in the same day. If you are looking for versatility this bike is a great choice. *Note Due to this Bicycle build being a single speed it forces the rider to completely change the way they ride which differs greatly with the common multigeared bike approach of bike riding. When a rider encounters a hill with a multigeared bike the rider will start to down shift into a more "comfortable" gear to get up the hill where the single speed rider must be an aggressive rider and attack the hill to maintain their momentum up the hill and over and then turn to pedal grinding at the top of the hill which gives the rider a great core body workout. Single speed riders mindset is about efficiency and well timed bike riding position changes to maximize your power output. Hizoku Bicycle Company is a premium bicycle building company. We have extensive knowledge in building bikes from the ground up. We carry only products and gear we believe in and have first hand experience with. All of our bike builds use only high quality long lasting/bomb proof components to ensure our customers a long and fruitful relationship with their new bikes. We want to spread to the world the pure joy and exhilaration one gets from riding a single speed/fixed gear bike. Our bikes are extremely responsive, lightweight and will take anything you throw at them. All of our bike builds come ready to ride out of the box minus the installation of the handle bars, pedals , seat and front wheel. Takes no more than 20 minutes to adjust these components to your desired specifications for riding. The bike drive chain has been professionally installed to ensure true chain straightness and tension with the crank and freewheel/fixed gear cog, for an optimal riding experience. Each of our bike builds come with a free Hizoku Bicycle Co T-shirt in your selected size.

name: SOLD OUT! Hizoku Cycles Night-Saber Illumination System
description:
SOLD OUT! more stock coming soon.

Hizoku Cycles Night-Saber Illumination System Beta Version 2.0

$30.00 + shipping for set of 2 lights Front and Rear
 or
$16.00 per Night-Saber + shipping when sold separately.

$10.00 for a 6 pack of High Performance SR44 Cell button batteries for an extra 24hr burntime on one light or 12hr extra burntime for each light in our system.

Combo Includes: 1 Front Ice Night-Saber, 1 Rear Fire Night-Saber 2 360 Degree Rotating rubber mounts, 6 high performance Sr44 silver oxide cell batteries and an additional 6 regular alkaline cell button batteries for extra runtime.

Sold separately includes: 1 Night-Saber 1 360 degree rotating rubber mount, 3 high performance SR44 silver oxide cell button batteries and 3 regular alkaline cell button batteries for extra runtime.

This lighting system will allow drivers to see you from multiple angles at greater distances keeping you safe from cars on your night rides.

Each Night-Saber contains 4 very efficient and powerful Light Emitting Diodes that have over 10,000 hr lifespans for years of use. We use high performance Silver Oxide batteries to achieve an 8+hr run time with 3 SR44 cell button batteries on steady on position or up to 12+hrs with the slowest flashing mode on. 

Note: SR44 Silver Oxide batteries are the preferred battery to use in our light system to achieve the max 12 hr burntime, they look exactly like LR44 Alkaline batteries which give much less power giving only 3 hr burntime for 3 LR44 compared to 3 SR44 which can achieve 12hr burntime on the slowest flashing mode. We sell a 6 pack for 24+hr extra burntime for one light or 12hrs extra burntime for each light in our system.

SR44 Silver Oxide batteries are very expensive in a regular store costing $9+ for just 3 batteries compared to our 6 pack for just $10

Our Night-Sabers have 6 different modes of flashing and a steady on setting. The Night-Sabers have multiple position capabilities with the provided 360 degree rotating rubber mount.

Nearly 70% of all nighttime Bicycle-Car collisions are due to inadequate side visibility our system gives you excellent side visibility preventing cars from getting too close.

 NOTE: This is not a replacement for a headlight these lights are designed to make sure drivers can see you at night from a distance. Making your night rides safer.

name: Hizoku Cycles Utility Tool Bag
description:
Hizoku Cycles Utility Tool Bag

$26.00

NOW IN STOCK!

The perfect utility tool bag for cycling it can hold anything from snacks to water bottles, and bike tools. It can attach to your belt, the back of your seat rails on your bike, on the front handle bars of your bike for easy access or even onto a backpack as an extra pocket.
Comes equipped with a quick and easy drawstring opening to ensure your gear to stay inside the bag and not fall out while riding.
Made of durable nylon oxford materials
Waterproof

Dimensions : 8 inches tall X 6 inches wide X 4 inches thick
 
Comes in 3 colors Black, Olive, and Camo

name: Hizoku Cycles Single-Speed Bottle Pop 15mm Wrench
description: Sold out more coming soon! 15mm Pop-Wrench $13.00 + Shipping Hand formed, shaped and finished chromed steel. If you are looking for the ultimate bottle opener that happens to be an extremely useful 15mm box wrench end that works on most single speed bike axle nuts then the Pop-Wrench is for you. Weight: 2.7 oz Length: 4.5 inches Features: Unique semi-deep socket end provides extra bolt clearance. High-polished cleans easily 12 point socket end provides maximum versatility. Recessed corners in socket end provide extra turning power. Includes: 15mm box wrench with bottle cap opener, Mini carabiner clip, and paracord lanyard. Watch it in action POP-WRENCH CLIP
